title: Did George Soros pay three million Democrats to vote to close the government?
subtitle: Among the many reasons for the closure of the United States federal government in January 2018, bribes to senators from George Soros were not among them.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: The Hungarian-American billionaire George Soros bribed three members of the Democratic Senate to vote for the closure of the U.S. federal government.
